feed.title: Few-body interactions constrain entanglement
feed.subtitle: SYK model is widely believed to render Page curve, but is that one-hundred percent true? We show that few-body interactions can constrain the entanglement of the system, and the Page curve is not a universal feature of the SYK model.

entry.title: Thermal bound
entry.content: Applying eigenstate thermalization hypothesis (ETH) to the mid-spectrum eigenstates already gives a bound on the entanglement entropy.
entry.summary: Applying eigenstate thermalization hypothesis (ETH) to the mid-spectrum eigenstates already gives a bound on the entanglement entropy.
